availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John P. Monroe (Monroe County, Kentucky, miller.)

body.p: Monroe County, Kentucky, miller. Virginia native. Married to Louiza Monroe. Father of Caroline S. Monroe, Mary A Monroe, Martha L Monroe, Sarah Frances Monroe, Edward A Monroe, Amelia Monroe, Minerva Monroe, John Monroe, and William Monroe. Merchant in Barren County, Kentucky in 1850. Miller in Monroe County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren, Division 2, 414B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kentucky, Monroe, p. 29.
